description:
The plugin has one step with which:
- Creates a wallet address
- Generates a private key
- Activates the wallet (for this action you will need an already activated account)
- Signs the transaction
- Sends the transaction to the Tron network

After completing the step, you have the address and private key of your wallet.

If necessary, you can copy and modify the plugin.

The plugin was created in accordance with the Tron documentation: https://developers.tron.network/docs/getting-start.
name: Tron wallet creator (new)
plugin_instructions:
For the plugin to work:
- Add the API key to the api_key field (get the API key from https://www.trongrid.io/).
- Add the private key of your Tron wallet to the private_key field

Use the "Create a wallet" action from the plugins section in your workflow
